name: bunker

bunker noun [C]
(SHELTER)
Add to word list

a shelter, usually underground, that has strong walls to protect the people inside it from bullets or bombs

bunker noun [C]
(GOLF)
UK (US sand trap) in golf, a hollow area of ground filled with sand, that is difficult to hit a ball out of
ardaguldogan/E+/GettyImages
